message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to own a high-quality item that I'm sure you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7500. Can you meet me at this price?

Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can sell it to you for $8200. It's a great compromise that still benefits both of us.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7000. Can you meet me at this price?

I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I can sell the product to you for $8000, which is my minimum price. It's a great opportunity for you to get an amazing product at a fair price.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6800. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm not willing to go any lower than my minimum price, Bob. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway between $8000 and $6800. I can sell the product to you for $7400. It's a fair compromise that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6500. Can you consider this price?

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go any lower than my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell the product to you for $7200. It's a fair price that still benefits both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit higher on the price. I'm willing to pay $6000 for the product. This is my final offer.
